info.reason: The difficulty in exiting a feature indicates an issue with understanding the navigation or workflow.

info.description: The participant is unable to change the size of an element as expected.
info.user_said: 这个size怎么动，这个size怎么也不能动？
info.reason: The inability to resize an element is directly related to image editing functionality.

info.description: The participant struggles with adjusting image attributes other than filters and finds the tools not intuitive.
info.user_said: 我去调一下这个，还挺还挺麻烦的实话说，我觉得还不如我自己做呢。没有去调图片的其他能力，它只是调一调这个滤镜。
info.reason: The participant struggles with adjusting image attributes, pointing to functionality issues within the image editing features.

info.description: After removing the background from an image, the selection box remains the original size, creating difficulty when arranging elements.
info.user_said: 而且它这个去掉这个background之后。它整个的选的这个框又是这个size的。其实很麻烦的对我来说，这个我觉得很多设计软件都有这个弊病。就导致我最后他很有可能会跟我之前的文案进行重叠。然后选择的时候就会很难受，可能会选到另一张图上。
info.reason: After removing the background, the selection box does not adjust, which creates difficulty when arranging elements, showing issues with element selection and manipulation.

info.description: Difficulty in selecting and editing elements without accidentally selecting other elements.
info.user_said: 排一下。你看这种就容易选到这上面就很烦，我觉得这个设计挺不爽的，这个remove background。Activities, gift sharing, singing。
info.reason: The problem of selecting unintended elements relates to the efficiency of the UI in facilitating element selection.

info.description: The participant experiences difficulty with the text tool, as it does not default to the preferred font choice.
info.user_said: 这个也不是很舒服。就是为什么，我觉得这个字体很好，但是我每次点到上面这个字体的时候，它就不能默认到我觉得很好的这个字体。
info.reason: The issue with the text tool not retaining preferred choices pertains to text editing functionality.

info.description: Confusion about how to modify elements, indicating a lack of clear and intuitive interfaces.
info.user_said: 你是从哪儿生出来的？怎么去修改它？我忘了。怎么修改呀？
info.reason: The confusion over element modification suggests a lack of clarity in the process within the application.

info.description: The participant is frustrated with the low resolution of elements and the inability to change certain aspects of the design.
info.user_said: 这边还有这个试一下行不行。我感觉也不行，他这个分辨率都好低，看的我好难受。
info.reason: Frustration with element quality and limited editing options is related to the core functionality of image editing.

info.description: The participant feels that the system is not particularly user-friendly and is afraid of losing work by navigating away.
info.user_said: 还行吧，但也不是特别好用。我感觉这个这个背景之后没有想。因为我感觉我我不知道从哪点可以回去，然后反而我害怕这个我现在生成的又重新输一遍。这个这个这个不对，那就是有问题。Ok。
info.reason: The fear of losing work due to unclear navigation paths points to a broader issue with user satisfaction and experience.

info.description: The participant questioned if their long prompt could be accepted by the system.
info.user_said: 这么长的prompt可以接收进去吗？
info.reason: The participant is unsure about the process of how the system handles long prompts, indicating a lack of clarity in the input process.

info.description: The participant noted that the 'Happy Christmas' theme was not placed at the top of the poster as they wanted.
info.user_said: 它这个生成的海报”Happy Christmas”没有放在这里，想的是放在海报的上方。
info.reason: The AI did not place the text where the user expected, indicating a misunderstanding of the user's prompt.

info.description: The participant noticed that the system-generated images varied and did not consistently place the theme at the top of the poster, questioning whether the system's understanding of the prompt was influenced by language issues.
info.user_said: 但是觉得这个prompt语义的理解还是没有到位，比如说它每一张图生成的都不太一样，有一些比较关键的地方，比如说要把这个海报的主题放到最上面，像它有些放在了上面，但大部分都是放在了下面，不知道是不是中英文的原因。但如果是中文prompt的话，感觉不太，可能需要做一些更多的调整。
info.reason: The issue is directly related to the AI's interpretation of the user's instructions, especially regarding the position of the theme in different languages.

info.description: The participant had to make manual adjustments to the AI-generated output.
info.user_said: 修改一下。
info.reason: The participant's need to manually adjust AI outputs suggests difficulty in customizing the layout and design.

info.description: The participant repeated the word 'time' multiple times, suggesting difficulty in adding or editing the time for the Christmas party.

info.reason: The participant seems to be struggling with adding specific details, implying a need for better assistive features or documentation.

info.description: The participant changed the font multiple times, indicating a potential issue with finding or applying the desired typography.

info.reason: This reflects difficulties with text editing functionalities, particularly in choosing and applying fonts.

info.description: The participant was confused about how to use the color palette.
info.user_said: 这个色盘是怎么用？
info.reason: If the color palette's usage is not intuitive, this indicates an issue with the visibility and discoverability of tools within the user interface.

info.description: The user took some time after stating the goal to find the Generate function for a Christmas poster, possibly indicating discoverability issues.

info.description: The participant selects a simple design but may be indicating a lack of variety or difficulty finding a complex or more decorated template suitable for a Christmas poster.

info.description: The user was looking for images to add but might have struggled to find or was unsure if images could be added, indicating a potential lack of visibility or intuitive navigation.

info.reason: The user's uncertainty in finding or adding images suggests challenges with the image editing features.

info.description: The user wants to make the font bigger, change the color, and make it bold, which suggests a lack of clarity or difficulty in using text editing tools.

info.description: The participant notes that some images are too realistic and may not match the desired style of the poster.

info.reason: The user's comment about the realism of images not fitting the desired style suggests an issue with AI-generated content matching the poster's theme.

info.description: The user seems to have difficulty finding a variety of images to include in the poster, settling for bells as there are not many options.
info.user_said: 好像图也不是那么的多，那就挂几个铃铛吧。
info.reason: Difficulty in finding a variety of images points to a problem with the availability of content assets.

info.description: The participant adds promotional language and details about the party, which could indicate that the template did not prompt or provide sections for this important event information.
info.user_said: We prepare special dishes and drinks to celebrate Jesus’s birthday. 再加一句What a wonderful day。
info.reason: Adding promotional language manually might indicate that the template didn’t guide the inclusion of such event details.

info.description: The user had to specify the time and location for the event within the design, which may have required multiple steps or was not straightforward.
info.user_said: 加上时间地点。那么我们就让时间是圣诞节的前一天，是24号，周日。
info.reason: The need to manually input time and location suggests a lack of clarity in the process for adding event details.

info.description: The user needed to adjust the positioning of text, which suggests that the interface might not have been immediately intuitive or easily adjustable.

info.reason: Adjusting text positioning could be indicative of difficulties with selecting and manipulating text elements.

info.description: The participant decides to change an image, possibly indicating dissatisfaction with the initial choice or a mismatch with the poster’s theme.

info.description: The user attempts to upload a draft but encounters an issue or delay, indicated by loading.
info.user_said: 诶，add media. 但我要怎么传？让我来试一下。然后add，我先把这个传到电脑上，你的电脑允不允许我air drop呢？要微信，好吧，我登你的微信。正在加载中。

info.description: Difficulty understanding whether a description needs to be added after uploading an image.
info.user_said: 然后呢，我就把这个上传上来。
info.reason: The user is unsure whether a description is needed after uploading, which suggests a lack of clarity in the UI about the next steps or options available

info.description: The user expresses frustration with the generation of irrelevant content, stating that the system misunderstood the draft as wallpaper in a living room instead of a Christmas poster.
info.user_said: 哇，他给我生成了好没用的东西。我想要它基于我的草稿来做，结果它把我的草稿当做了客厅里的挂纸。
info.reason: The AI generates irrelevant content, indicating a problem with how it interprets user prompts.

info.description: The user finds that the media does not seem to be useful for generation purposes.

info.reason: The user perceives the media upload feature as not useful, which suggests a gap in feature functionality.

info.description: The user receives a message about triggering a guideline without clear information on the issue.
info.user_said: 他说不能被generate因为有些东西，may have triggered this guideline，please change. 为什么呢？
info.reason: The user receives an unclear error message regarding a guideline trigger, indicating an issue with the clarity of error messages.

info.description: The user decides to delete the media after encountering issues with it, suggesting a lack of user control or freedom.
info.user_said: 好的，我现在的决定是删掉这个Media。然后，我现在设置一下...
info.reason: The decision to delete media reflects dissatisfaction with the tool's capabilities or output.

info.description: The user expects the AI to generate content based on a sketch, but it does not meet expectations, leading to a comment about the tool being 'rubbish'.
info.user_said: 按道理来说我给他一个草图的话，那个GPT都会能够根据我的草图生成东西，但是这个就不行，垃圾，垃圾工具。
info.reason: The tool does not meet the user's expectations of AI capabilities, highlighting an issue with AI interpretation.

info.description: Difficulty in getting the system to understand the concept of left and right in the design.
info.user_said: 但是呢，他好像是有点难以理解左和右这个概念是不是，怎么给我做出了PPT封面呢？
info.reason: The system struggles with spatial concepts such as left and right, which is a problem with AI interpretation of user prompts.

info.description: The system generated the same result multiple times, indicating a lack of intelligent variation in generation.

info.reason: The AI generates the same result multiple times, indicating a problem with variation and style matching.

info.description: The user is pleased with a generated element but is unable to customize it as desired, particularly with regards to positioning (left and right sides).

info.reason: The user cannot customize the generated element's position, indicating a lack of layout adaptability.

info.description: Uncertainty about which features are powered by AI and how to use them.

info.reason: The user is unsure which features are AI-powered, which indicates a visibility issue.

info.description: The user is searching for AI features to use but cannot find them, expressing a lack of visibility of AI functionalities.

info.reason: Difficulty in finding AI features points to a problem with the visibility of these options.

info.description: Difficulty in finding how to make the poster 'shine' or have a 'blingbling' effect.

info.reason: The user has trouble figuring out how to make the design shine, suggesting an issue with aesthetic customization capabilities.

info.description: The user wants to adjust the line spacing but seems unable to do so, resulting in a decision to duplicate the text multiple times as a workaround.
info.user_said: 那我现在的目标就是改行间距，但是改不了行间距，那改不了行间距的话呢，我就决定复制粘贴很多个版本，这样就不用改行间距。

info.description: Uncertainty on how to correctly format the date and time for the event on the poster.
info.user_said: 接下来写日期了。日期是用这个格式写。
info.reason: Uncertainty about formatting date and time suggests a need for assistive features or better documentation.

info.description: The user is confused about the function of certain design elements and how to achieve a specific visual effect, indicating a lack of clarity in the interface.
info.user_said: 那这个是什么呢？诶，什么意思？色块吗？
info.reason: The user is confused about the purpose of design elements, suggesting an issue with selecting and understanding UI elements.

info.description: The user is impressed with the 'Remove background' feature but finds the outcome somewhat startling, indicating the feature's effect may not be well communicated.
info.user_said: Sparkle，来一个。 这个怎么叠呢？要把它的背景给去掉，Remove background，有个干扰者，哇，我要拍照。
info.reason: The 'Remove background' feature produces an unexpected outcome, pointing to an image editing issue.

info.description: The participant noticed a discrepancy between their expectations and the generated output. This indicates a possible mismatch between user expectations and the system's output.
info.user_said: 看到他生成的这些跟我的想象还是有一些差距的。
info.reason: The problem lies in the AI’s understanding of the given prompts and generating output that does not align with the user’s expectations.

info.description: The user expressed a need for a feature to tweak an existing poster template rather than generating something from scratch, which seems to be missing.
info.user_said: 但是这个具体要怎么改，就是我现在看到的这些就是它生成的首先他的风格也很不一样，然后如果说有一个功能可以指定一个poster，然后就是在这个指定的poster的基础上去改一些小的东西会比较好，但看起来他现在没有这个功能。
info.reason: The participant is looking for more flexibility to customize and adapt an existing template to their needs, which is not currently offered.

info.description: The user specified the title and layout in the prompt, but the generated design did not reflect these details.
info.user_said: 那这个就很有点奇怪，因为我其实在prompt里面就是已经specify了它的title以及他的一些layout的部分，比如说时间和地点，但是它并没有就是显示出来这样的内容。
info.reason: The AI failed to interpret the detailed prompt regarding the title and layout correctly, leading to a generated design that did not match the specified requirements.

info.description: The participant had to manually adjust the title and add time and location information which was not automatically included.
info.user_said: Customize的时候首先先调整一下它的title，就是我一开始在title的prompt里面写的是christmas party，但是他给我的回复是christmas party poster，所以应该把这个poster给删掉。
info.reason: The user had to manually input and format text, which indicates a functionality issue where the AI did not automatically include essential text elements.

info.description: The participant seems to struggle with finding and using customizable components for their design.
info.user_said: 那这个时候我可能就需要他，当他已经生成了这些东西之后，如果他有一个具体的customize的component会比较好，就像之前如果说用PS作图，那可能大家就会在网上找一些那种component，比如说在这个里面它有一个，有一个这样的tag，但是这样不太好描述。
info.reason: The user experienced difficulty in finding and using customizable components, suggesting problems with selecting and manipulating design elements effectively.

info.description: The user attempts to generate a tag but finds the results unsatisfactory and not particularly useful. The tag generation feature does not meet user needs and expectations.
info.user_said: 嗯，它能生成一些，但是也不是特别像，感觉没什么用。
info.reason: The user's attempt to generate a tag resulted in unsatisfactory outcomes, which indicates a lack in the availability or quality of assets provided by the system.

info.description: The user finished the task but seems to be left with a feeling that the tools provided were not entirely useful or did not meet the need.
info.user_said: 感觉就完成了。
info.reason: The overall sentiment suggests that the user was dissatisfied with the tool's capabilities, which is a broader user experience concern.
